tool_description: Identifies stopover sites during migration by analyzing movement patterns, residence time, and clustering of GPS locations.

timestamps.description: Array of GPS fix timestamps during migration

latitudes.description: Array of latitude values during migration

longitudes.description: Array of longitude values during migration

minimum_residence_hours.description: Minimum time at location to qualify as stopover (>= 6)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have equal length.
Insufficient migration data: Need at least 15 GPS fixes for stopover analysis.
Invalid residence time: minimum_residence_hours must be >= 6.
Invalid clustering radius: Must be between 1-50 km.
No stopovers detected: Migration data shows continuous movement without stops.
Temporal resolution too coarse: GPS fix intervals too long for accurate stopover detection.
usage: Provide GPS migration tracking data with timestamps and coordinates. Optionally set minimum_residence_hours and clustering_radius_km parameters for stopover criteria.

stopover_latitudes.description: Latitude coordinates of stopover site centers

stopover_longitudes.description: Longitude coordinates of stopover site centers

residence_times_hours.description: Duration spent at each stopover site in hours

stopover_summary.description: Summary of stopover patterns and characteristics
